string.comment:
movePieceFromE2ToE4
Note: Coordinates (A-G) currently remain the same regardless of which language the user has selected.

resources.string: Beweg d\'Figur vu e2 uf e4

resources.string: Stell uf b4 en Turm inne (nur bi Crazyhouse)

string.name: readOutClocks
string.comment:
readOutClocks
This is the help text for one of the possible keyboard commands. When this command is entered, the current clocks (player's remaining time) is read out loud. 'Read out' is used as a verb here.

resources.string: Wänn die obe zeigti Notazion ungwohnt isch, chann mer da meh drüber lerne:
Es zuesätzlichs \"x\", zum en Schlagzug markiere, isch freiwillig
Für Rochiere cha me de Buechstabe \"o\" und au d\'Zahl \"0\" verwände

string.name: ifItIsLegalToCastleBothWays
string.comment:
ifItIsLegalToCastleBothWays
'Enter' as in the key on a standard keyboard.

resources.string: Wänn beidi Rochade möglich sind, benutz \"Enter\" für d\'Königssiite

string.name: capitalizationOnlyMattersInAmbiguousSituations
string.comment:
capitalizationOnlyMattersInAmbiguousSituations
Note: Piece letters (K, Q, R, B, N) currently remain the same regardless of which language the user has selected.

resources.string: Grossschribig isch nu bi zweidütige Fäll vu Bedütig, z.B. wänn de \"d - Puur\" chönnt mit de Dame verwächslet werde
Für en \"Voruszug\" (premove) eifach de gwünschti Zug iitippe, bevor me draa isch
